review: She is a wonderful doctor and a great human being. I visited her for miscarriage and thereafter a successful pregnancy. She has been my doctor throughout my 4+ years of ttc and fertility journey and finally helped me deliver my beautiful baby boy. My delivery and post partum recovery was very very smooth inspite of csection due to baby being breech and several other complications. She is my most preferred gynaec in town! Thanks a lot to Maam!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Aditi Singhi is very humble, friendly and cooperative. We consulted her for our first baby and received complete attention. Dr. Aditi singhi is very patient for our each and every query and provided detail guidance during all our appointments.With best advice from Dr. Aditi and God grace, we had a smooth journey of pregnancy and we are blessed with healthy baby despite the complications.She has suggested Fortis hospital for the delivery under her observation which was the best and gave us pleasant memories and the staff also was very cooperative.We highly recommend and appreciate her for her work with all the good wishes!! ThanksNeha and Nitish Bhatia

dr.aditi is very humble, caring doctor. I have never seen such a gr8 human being.usually dr.doesnt visit only for 1 pt. but she do visited in godrej hospital only for me. she is my gynaecologist from 2013. I visited her for delayed period she took detailed history advise blood test and after confirming I am not pregnant she advise me tablet after that my period came but there was heavy bleeding so I called her she answered my call and advise tablet to stop bleeding.now blood flow is reduced. thank u so much dr.for being patience with me & answered my call & resolved my problems. I will highly recommend dr.aditi to all. she is not only professional but very friendly as well. may god give u more & more success. keep doing good work  Regards jenifer

One of my most memorable interactions with Dr. Aditi Singhi. I was blessed with a baby girl through normal delivery under her supervision. She was able to relate to every aspect of my  9 month journey. I would strongly recommend her because of her expertise and sincerity in her field. I wish her the best of luck in her career.
*** ** * **** ******* Takes time explaining the issue and treats the right way... I trust her treatment.
